item.title: By: Tiffany Morrant
item.dc:creator: Tiffany Morrant
item.description: I made this tonight, and OMG, it is so amazing. Have had this recipe bookmarked for ages, but hadn't yet made it. Wish I had sooner. Thank you so much. Halved it, because I was only feeding 2 adults, 1 11yo and a toddler, and it was perfect.
item.content:encoded: I made this tonight, and OMG, it is so amazing. Have had this recipe bookmarked for ages, but hadn’t yet made it. Wish I had sooner. Thank you so much. Halved it, because I was only feeding 2 adults, 1 11yo and a toddler, and it was perfect.

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Everyone - thanks again for the lovely comments!!
Hi FFichiban - :( hope you get your Indian fix soon!!! It may be a bit creamier... but OMG, it's gorgeous!!!
Hi Alexandra - I certainly do :P Can't get enough (apart from it taking a while to cook)

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Wahhh >_< I haven't had Indian in wayyyy too loonngg and all your posts are getting too muchh that I fear I will eat my computer... Your Korma seems lighter and I guess creamier than other places? Either way it looks soooooo goood mmmmmm ^^!
item.content:encoded:
Wahhh >_< I haven’t had Indian in wayyyy too loonngg and all your posts are getting too muchh that I fear I will eat my computer…
Your Korma seems lighter and I guess creamier than other places? Either way it looks soooooo goood mmmmmm ^^!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Yum, the meat would be tender with the long cooking time. I like the idea of combining yoghurt and cream too.
item.content:encoded: Yum, the meat would be tender with the long cooking time. I like the idea of combining yoghurt and cream too.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: That looks wonderufl. I love a creamy korma curry and in this weather, this would be the perfect dinner with a fat wedge of your naan!
item.content:encoded: That looks wonderufl. I love a creamy korma curry and in this weather, this would be the perfect dinner with a fat wedge of your naan!
